title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Skills: Social Media-Based Online Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and research methodologies, with experience in utilizing social media platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can effectively communicate in online collaborative projects using social media tools.
Learners can autonomously establish and execute learning plans in a blended learning environment.
Learners can successfully complete project outcomes by collaborating with peer learners for scientific topic research.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
